title: Night Shift
description: She was hired to protect me, but I'm falling in love...I became a nurse to help others, but I keep my heart distant. It's easier that way. Sometimes, people aren't who you think they are. I'm content to just focus on my work...Until I meet her.My hospital hired extra security to protect the nurses from a dangerous stalker. One night on my way home from work, I flee the psycho and run straight into her arms.Strong, confident, and mature, she's the head bodyguard and CEO of the security company. And she wants to spend the night on my couch to make sure I'm safe.Of course I say yes...but I want so much more.I know she can protect my body, but can I protect my heart?
author: Clara Reese
